data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gabris, Radim, Kundrata, Robin, Trnka, Filip (2016): Review of Dolichostyrax Aurivillius (Cerambycidae, Lamiinae) in Borneo, with descriptions of three new genera and the first case of (ovo) viviparity in the long-horned beetles. ZooKeys 587: 49-75, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.587.7961, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.587.7961
